project_info.project_path: Experiments/contracts/Iosiro- Synthetix SIP-37 Smart Contract Audit/synthetix

findings.title: Refactoring Suggestions
findings.description: It is recommended that certain portions of the code be refactored to improve readability.

findings.title: Implement Temporal Validation in effectiveValueAtRound(...)
findings.description: The `effectiveValueAtRound(...)` function lacks temporal validation, allowing exchange rates with vastly different times to be used together.
